mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market(MEMBERID, CATEGORYID, MARKETNAME, MARKETDETAIL, MARKETTHUMB,MARKETBANNER) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{category.categoryID}, #{marketName}, #{marketDetail}, #{marketThumbnail}, #{marketBanner})
mapper.select: SELECT marketId, memberId, marketName, marketDetail, marketThumb, marketBanner, categoryId FROM Market WHERE marketId = #{id}
SELECT marketId FROM Market WHERE memberId = #{id}
SELECT articleId FROM MarketArticle WHERE marketId = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM followMarket WHERE marketId = #{marketId} AND memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE followMarket WHERE marketId = #{marketId} AND memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.PRODUCTID, pp.PRODUCTID parentId, pp.PRODUCTNAME, p.PRODUCTNAME optionName, p.PRODUCTPRICE , i.PRODIMGURL FROM RECEIPT r , ORDERDETAIL o , PRODUCT p , PRODUCTIMAGE i, PRODUCT pp WHERE r.MEMBERID = #{id} AND o.ORDERSTATUS = 'F' AND o.RECEIPTID = r.RECEIPTID AND o.PRODUCTID = p.PRODUCTID AND p.PRODUCTID = i.PRODUCTID AND p.PARENTPID = pp.PRODUCTID AND pp.PRODUCTNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO marketArticle(marketId, articleTitle, articleContent) VALUES(#{market.marketId}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent})
INSERT INTO marketArticleImage(articleId, imageName, isThumbnail, imagePath) VALUES(#{articleId},#{imageName}, #{isThumbnail}, #{imagePath})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM marketArticleImage WHERE articleId = #{articleId} AND isThumbnail = 1

SELECT cp.productId, pp.productId parentId, pp.productName productName, cp.productName optionName, cp.productPrice, i.prodimgUrl, cp.categoryId FROM articleProduct ap, product cp, product pp, productImage i WHERE ap.articleId = #{articleId} AND ap.productId = cp.productId AND cp.parentpId = pp.productId AND cp.productId = i.productId
SELECT articleId, marketId, articleTitle, regDate FROM marketArticle WHERE marketId = #{marketId} ORDER BY articleId DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT m.marketid, m.marketname, m.marketthumb, rownum AS rnum FROM market m, followmarket f WHERE m.marketid = f.marketid AND f.memberid = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM market m LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM followmarket WHERE memberid = #{memberId}) f ON m.marketid = f.marketid WHERE f.marketid IS NULL
SELECT * FROM marketarticle ORDER BY regdate DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM marketArticleImage WHERE articleId = #{articleId} AND isthumbnail = #{isthumbnail}
